SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "reports" WHERE "reports"."action_taken_at" IS NOT ? AND "reports"."action_taken_at" BETWEEN $? AND $?

SELECT axis.*, ( WITH resolved_reports AS ( SELECT reports.id FROM reports WHERE date_trunc(?, reports.action_taken_at)::date = axis.period ) SELECT count(*) FROM resolved_reports ) AS value FROM ( SELECT generate_series(date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, interval ?) AS period ) AS axis
